name: Prosciutto, Fig and Parmesan Rolls
description: This quick and easy appetizer is also incredibly elegant. Just wrap a ribbon of prosciutto around a wafer of Parmesan cheese nestled against a sliver of dried fig, and drizzle with olive or truffle oil.
recipeIngredient: About 1/4 pound Parmesan, sliced wafer thin
8 to 10 dried figs, stemmed and cut into about 3 strips each

recipeInstructions.text: Cut each piece of prosciutto in half the long way; on each piece, put a slice of Parmesan and a strip of fig. Roll up the long way, pressing so meat sticks to itself. Cover with plastic wrap if not serving right away.
Serve within 2 hours, drizzling truffle or olive oil on top just before serving.

video.name: Nibbles for Holiday Entertaining
video.description: Mark Bittman prepares simple, sophisticated bites for your holiday platter.
